content: Hello everyone, Is there any sample client app to test ProviderDirectory API that can be installed within our network?
https://github.com/saulakravitz lot of great stuff in here. Including a plannet client
@Saul Kravitz I assume I can share this freely with people?

See the material from the recent connectathon with references to open source reference implementations.
Cut and pasted here:

  • Implementation Guide:
    • http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1
  • Hosted Reference Implementations
    • Server: https://davinci-plan-net-ri.logicahealth.org/fhir
    • Client: https://plan-net-client.herokuapp.com/
  • Reference Implementation Code
    • Server: https://github.com/HL7-DaVinci/plan-net-ri
    • Sample Data: https://github.com/HL7-DaVinci/pdex-plan-net-sample-data
    • Client: https://github.com/HL7-DaVinci/plan-net_client
  • Test Scripts
    • Touchstone_DaVinci_PDex_PlanNet_Scripts
